content: create cozy stylish mittens in no time with the one hank wonder crochet mittens pattern perfect for beginners gift-makers market sellers and charity crocheters this beginner-friendly pattern uses less than one skein of worsted weight yarn the one-piece design works up quickly and the adjustable sizing ensures a perfect fit for everyone with just a few hours you can crochet a beautiful pair of mittens making this pattern perfect for last-minute gifts or bulk market prep the pattern is also versatile choose your favorite yarn color adjust the size and crochet mittens uniquely yours why you ll love this pattern uses less than one skein of yarn great for stash-busting adjustable sizing ensures a custom fit beginner-friendly instructions make it easy to follow perfect for gifts
